title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 4066/86 of 22 December 1986 concerning transitional measures for imports from third countries of manioc falling within subheading 07.06 A of the Common Customs Tariff and amending Regulation (EEC) No 950/68 on the Common Customs Tariff
header:
COUNCIL  REGULATION (EEC) No 4066/86
of 22 December 1986
concerning transitional measures for imports from third countries of manioc falling within subheading 07.06 A of the Common Customs Tariff and amending Regulation (EEC) No 950/68 on the Common Customs Tariff
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The detailed rules of application of this Regulation shall be adopted in accordance with the procedure laid down in Article 26 of Regulation (EEC) No 2727/75 (3).
The text concerning subheading 07.06 A of the Common Customs Tariff in Regulation (EEC) No 950/68 shall be retained as set out in the Annex.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 November 1986.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 December 1986.
For the Council
The President
G. SHAW
(1) OJ No L 155, 10. 6. 1986, p. 8.
(2) OJ No L 219, 28. 7. 1982, pages 56 and 58.
(3) OJ No L 281, 1. 1. 1975, p. 1.
ANNEX

Manioc, arrowroot, salep and other similar roots and tubers with high starch content, excluding sweet potatoes:   //   //  //   // I. Fresh or dried, whole or sliced, but not further processed   // 6 (L)   // (b)   //   // II. Other, including pellets   // 6 (L)   // (b)   //    //   //   //
(b) 6 % ad valorem, subject to certain conditions.
